Document.Focus: 10 ways to cut 500 calories a day

QAPair.Question: Do you have information about 10 ways to cut 500 calories a day
QAPair.Answer: No matter what type of diet you follow, to lose weight you need to burn more calories than you take in each day. For most people with overweight, cutting about 500 calories a day is a good place to start. If you can eat 500 fewer calories every day, you should lose about a pound (450 g) a week. Always talk with your health care provider to determine a healthy weight for you before starting a weight-loss diet.
